Articles.Content:
So. I just got on KSP, when I see that everything is fine, except that Kerbin's menu texture is shaking like it's got an earthquake that's ready to crumble the planet.

Could someone help me with this problem?
Could you post a screenshot or video showing this "shaking" effect?

Ok.

Edit: sorry, the game crashed on me, I don't have much GB left on my laptop.

I don't think that playing non-64 bit KSP will work.

Edited June 16, 2016 by Fredbear12returns
